Nightlight::

Nightlight's pod control pad started to show this information:

Language cicuits have been repaired, the program are running and soon 
the protophom will be using it.

The stasis lock program had been retired by the pod, and the femme 
was starting to wake up. 
 



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang: Will she be okay, Kenzo?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: Opps, I thought it was already opened.
> > 
> > IC:
> > After installing a new launguage circuitries and repairing the ID 
> > circuitries to protect what data was left in them and then 
repairing 
> > any psysical damage he waited to see if she would come out of 
stasis 
> > lock.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > OOC: I'll assume that Kenzo opened the pod.
> > > 
> > > Nightlight::
> > > 
> > > The linght fell on a femenine body, she was tall and delicate. 
Her 
> > > skin was silver and black. Her face was oval and delicate.Her 
lips 
> > > thin and her nose was thin too. In the middle of her fore head 
was 
> > a 
> > > blue jewel. Her eyes were closed and it seemed that she was 
trying 
> > to 
> > > woke up. She was using a feline-like helmet and her face was 
more 
> > > human than feline.
> > > 
> > > Her body was like BW's Silverbolt but more delicate.
